scripts.build: bun run build:ts && bun run build:rust && bun run build:python
scripts.build:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo build --release || echo 'Rust build skipped - no rust directory'
scripts.build:python: test -n "$SKIP_PYTHON_BUILD" && echo 'Python build skipped (SKIP_PYTHON_BUILD set)' || (test -d python && cd python && (timeout 120 python3 -m build 2>/dev/null || timeout 120 pyproject-build 2>/dev/null) || echo 'Python build skipped or timed out')
scripts.test: bun run test:ts && bun run test:rust && bun run test:python
scripts.test:ts: cd typescript && vitest run || echo 'TypeScript tests skipped - no tests found'
scripts.test:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo test || echo 'Rust tests skipped'
scripts.test:python: test -d python && cd python && pytest -p no:anchorpy --asyncio-mode=auto || echo 'Python tests skipped'
scripts.lint:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo clippy --all-targets --fix --allow-dirty --allow-staged -- -D warnings && cargo fmt || echo 'Rust lint skipped'
scripts.lint:python: test -d python && cd python && ruff check --fix . && ruff format . || echo 'Python lint skipped'
scripts.typecheck:python: test -d python && cd python && mypy . --ignore-missing-imports || echo 'Python typecheck skipped'
scripts.typecheck:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo check || echo 'Rust typecheck skipped'

AI_GATEWAY_API_KEY.description: API key for Vercel AI Gateway (OpenAI-compatible endpoints).

AIGATEWAY_API_KEY.description: Alternate env var for AI Gateway API key.

VERCEL_OIDC_TOKEN.description: OIDC token for Vercel (used as Bearer auth for Gateway).

AI_GATEWAY_BASE_URL.description: Base URL for AI Gateway OpenAI-compatible API.

AI_GATEWAY_SMALL_MODEL.description: Identifier of the small language model to be used.

AI_GATEWAY_LARGE_MODEL.description: Identifier of the large language model to be used.

AI_GATEWAY_EMBEDDING_MODEL.description: Identifier of the model to use for generating text embeddings.

AI_GATEWAY_EMBEDDING_DIMENSIONS.description: Number of dimensions for the returned embedding vectors.

AI_GATEWAY_IMAGE_MODEL.description: Identifier of the model used for image generation.
